scripts.dev: concurrently -n "API,MOBILE,ADMIN" -c "yellow,cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json forgy_backend_api/node_modules forgy_backend_api/package-lock.json forgy_mobile_app/node_modules forgy_mobile_app/package-lock.json forgy_admin_web/node_modules forgy_admin_web/package-lock.json
scripts.install:all: npm install && concurrently "cd forgy_backend_api && npm install" "cd forgy_mobile_app && npm install" "cd forgy_admin_web && npm install"
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
